topics.body:
Welp; we're fucked:
Greece bent on the debt talks and accepted a bailout that doesn't even cover a fifth of their debt.  While that is a lot of money it's nowhere even close to how much money they actually need to keep afloat.


Welp; we're double fucked:
For years it was projected that since China's economic growth was artificial growth that eventually shit would hit the fan and now their leaders can't do jack shit to stop their country from sliding back into poverty.

Call me crazy, but I wouldn't be surprised if in say thirty years hong kong and taiwan are their own micro countries because mainland china is probably going to start sliding back into poverty pretty soon.


Tl:dr; ". . . Well we're fucked; might as well watch everything slowly burn down"
!http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/617/165/386.gif!
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
So what do you guys think of Anime News Network? To me, when it comes to actual news and research on production of anime, they're pretty good. Their reviews however, yeah, they're um, let's just say not quite good. 

Also, for a site called *Anime* News Network, what's with all the video game news and reviews? I can understand if it has something to do with anime, but they even posted a review of Bloodborne of all things.
